app.title: SupportMail | Modern Modmail + Reports
app.description: SupportMail is a modern Discord bot that features modmail and reports to step up your server's moderation game.

hero.description: Effortlessly manage user tickets and reports with SupportMail

featuresDescription: SupportMail comes packed with tools designed to make the work of your server team effortless

feature-0.title: Tickets, but Modmail
feature-0.description: SupportMail allows users to open tickets with your server staff in a seamless and organized way.

feature-1.title: Reports
feature-1.description: Users can report other users or messages to your server team in a safe and easy way.

testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
testimonials.description: Don't just take our word for it - hear from the community managers who use our bot every day
